title: The Photographic Baseball Cards of Goodwin and Company
author: 1880nonsports

posts.post_title: The Photographic Baseball Cards of Goodwin and Company
posts.post_content: 70.00 - shipped free book rate USA. Check or paypal fine. New and unused. It's my last one.....
Henry--Does that mean that you sold the one Richard and I autographed for you?
It would be worth WAaaaaYyyyyyy more than $70 if it was autographed.
I asked because your ad said this was the last one. Joe doesn't sign for people who sell the book, I think. I know I wouldn't.
It's entrenched in my "important" signed books collection :-) I think I'm getting ready to de-assess(?) my signed Halper auction catalog - your book never came to mind.

Only one I have signed is not for sale despite the obfuscation caused by the mad ramblings of senior Miller. No matter as this is not going well :-( OK. The book is now for sale @ 135.00 OR 70.00 depending on whether you like Richard or not.............
